title: Is AMAZON BSR important, and do you care about best seller rankings?
description:
No Affiliate Links. No Courses. Just my honest opinion on all things self-publishing 🤙

____________________________________

Video Description

Amazon's BSR, or ABSR as it is known, is handy to let you know where your book sits, amongst others.
